page.title: 10THURNHAM PARISH CHURCH
page.content: The sparsely populated parish covers a large area of the North Downs and has only 200 parishioners. The congre- gation is gathered from surrounding Ecclesiastical parishes. 1985 Elec- toral roll 25. Financial turnover Â£7000. Diocesan quota Â£1400. St.Mary's is part of a united Benefice with Holy Cross Church, Bearsted, sharing the Rev. Alan Duke as Vicar. Sunday services with nos. attending:- 1st Sun in month 8am. Holy Communion 10. Every Sun 11.15am. alternate Mattins/Holy Communion 30. Quarterly United service with Methodist Church 50. Occasional Evensong 6.30pm. Christmas Day 130. Per year- Baptisms 2, Funerals 2, Weddings 3. 3 bells, rung occasionally. Choir of gentlemen, ladies, boys and girls.
